TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Action implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase

summary.span: 表示一个 Excel 工作簿中的智能标记操作，该工作簿通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

span.span: Represents a smart tag action in an Excel workbook that is customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作是在识别特定类型的智能标记时, 智能标记快捷菜单上可用的选项。Actions are the choices available on the smart tag shortcut menu when a smart tag of a certain type is recognized. 若要创建操作, 请使用`Globals.Factory.CreateAction`方法创建对象。To create an action, use the `Globals.Factory.CreateAction` method to create an object.. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage 此类型仅适用于 Excel 2007 的项目。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007. Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010.. [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 , 它具有可识别字词 "甩卖" 和正则表达式 "[i|i] ssue\s\d{5,6}" 的。The following code example creates a with an that recognizes the term "sale" and the regular expression "[I|i]ssue\s\d{5,6}". 操作在运行时修改操作的菜单标题, 并显示已识别的文本的地址。The action modifies the menu caption of the action at run time and displays the address of the text that was recognized. 若要测试该示例, 请在一个单元格中键入 "甩卖" 一词, 并在另一个单元格中键入字符串 "issue 12345", 然后尝试智能标记操作。To test the example, type the word "sale" in one cell and the string "issue 12345" in another cell, and then try the smart tag action. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 在用户单击智能标记图标之后、智能标记菜单显示之前发生。Occurs after the user clicks the smart tags icon, and before the smart tag menu is displayed. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件使您有机会根据上下文更改智能标记标题。This event gives you an opportunity to change the smart tag caption based on context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序修改操作的菜单标题。The event handler modifies the menu caption of the action. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: 在智能标记菜单中的操作被单击时发生。Occurs when the action in the smart tag menu is clicked. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序将显示包含已识别的智能标记字词或表达式的单元格的地址。The event handler displays the address of the cell that contains the recognized smart tag term or expression. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#4)]
